name: Fire in the hole! (Lightbulb Games)
description:
Made for the Brackeys 2021.2 game jam!

Music by Juhani Junkala. (check him out Here)

EPILEPSY WARNING! CONTROLS

WASD/ARROWS TO MOVE.

HOLD LEFT-CLICK TO SHOOT (you can't damage the bomb)

RIGHT-CLICK TO SHOOT A HOMING MISSILE (has a cooldown)

OBJECTIVE

YOU ARE A S.W.A.T. MEMBER WITH A MISSION TO DEFUSE A BOMB... IT TAKES 3 MINUTES TO DEFUSE... BUT THE SUSPECTS WILL TRY TO EXPLODE THE BOMB BY SHOOTING AT IT SO YOU HAVE TO DEFEND IT AT ALL COSTS. OR ELSE.

  • Bar at the top is the bomb state; when it empties its game over
  • when the suspects shoot the bomb it will degrade the bomb state
  • timer at the top right is the time left for the defuse; when it hits zero you win.
CAUTION!

The bomb is very unstable and lets out a shockwave every few seconds that knocks EVERYTHING back. the less health it has the more often its going to release a shockwave.

SUSPECTS

Yellow guy: has a rifle

Blue guy: has a sniper

Red guy: has... fists?!
